name: Rodian (V)
Lore: 'Thuku is a typical male Rodian. Sent to hunt down Greedo by Navik the Red, head of the Chattza tribe. Rodians enjoy ''the hunt,'' so many are employed as assassins.',
Text: 'Once per game, may deploy a bounty hunter (except Greedo) to same site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Unless another •••Rodian is at same or related site, your Force drain bonuses at same planet site may not be canceled.',
